summary: Human services degree with ARCOM award; budget and administration experience in the Oklahoma National Guard training department; proficient in Microsoft Office; experienced in budgeting, research, policy analysis; capable of mentoring others; improved financial records to meet National Guard Bureau standards; strong leadership and teamwork.

experience.title: Management and Program Analysis
experience.description: Maintain detailed records of budgetary transactions for the annual SAO budget; manage accounting operations, close, reporting and reconciliations; prepare financial and regulatory reports; complete bank reconciliations for multiple entities; prepare expense forecasts; restructure and analyze software to improve budget reporting; revise and streamline inefficient procedures with automation software; analyze costs and revenues to project future trends.

experience.title: Budget Technician
experience.company: Oklahoma National Guard Aviation Flying Hour Program
experience.description: Analyze funding for aviation programs and training periods; conduct surveys and studies of current and past operations; review obligations and expenditures; prepare aviation summaries; summarize data for aviation plans, standards, and actions; identify deficiencies in resource consumption, training, workload, and scheduling; advise management on manpower authorizations; develop annual budget for aviation program; review funding trends and provide funding recommendations; develop annual training budget data and cost analyses; proficient with AFCOS, SAP, STANFINS, Defense Travel System, Excel, and Word.

experience.title: Budget Assistant
experience.description: Developed procedures and administrative processes for mobilization and training budgets totaling over $100 million; reviewed fund requests, monitored budget balances and obligations; conducted monthly reviews of unliqudated obligations; consolidated statistics for fiscal years; verified payroll totals and reconciled differences; developed budget estimates including Mid-Year reviews; monitored fund requests to ensure funding limits; systems knowledge in SIDPERS, AFCOS, GFEBS, FTSMCS, DTS; proficient with Microsoft Office.
